task.title: Blueberry Oatmeal Waffles
task.shortdesc: This is how to make blueberry oatmeal waffles.

context.p:
Ingredients
1 cup white whole wheat flour
1 tablespoon baking powder
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon ground allspice
1 cup quick cooking oats
1/3 cup unsweetened applesauce
1.5 cups unsweetened almond milk (or any non-dairy milk)
3 tablespoons pure maple syrup
2 tablespoons canola oil
1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract
1.5 cups frozen blueberries

Directions
Sift flour, baking powder, salt and allspice into a mixing bowl
Mix in the oats.
Make a well in the center and add applesauce, milk, maple syrup, oil and vanilla
Stir with just until combined.
